mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.gift_customer_id AS "giftCustomerId", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.merchant_code AS "merchantCode", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN gift_customer b ON b.id = a.gift_customer_id
mapper.select: select a.merchant_code as "merchantCode", a.gift_customer_id as "giftCustomerId", a.id as "giftCustomerGoods.id", a.goods_id as "giftCustomerGoods.goodsId", a.goods_count as "giftCustomerGoods.goodsCount", m.nickname as "merchantName", g.goods_name as "giftCustomerGoods.goodsName", g.goods_price as "giftCustomerGoods.goodsPrice", g.image as "giftCustomerGoods.image", g.unit as "giftCustomerGoods.unit" from gift_customer_goods a left join gift_customer c on c.id = a.gift_customer_id left join member_info m on m.id = c.customer_code left join goods_info g on g.id = a.goods_id where a.gift_customer_id = #{giftCustomerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gift_customer_goods( id, gift_customer_id, goods_id, goods_count, merchant_code, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{giftCustomerId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsCount}, #{merchantCode}, #{delFlag} )
